alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 1:32PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...Patchy Areas of Dense Fog Possible in the Middle Keys... Patches of fog, some locally dense, have developed across the Middle Keys. Visibilities are likely to be reduced to around 1 mile in general, with localized areas experiencing even further reduced visibilities. If lower visibilities materialize, a dense fog advisory will be needed. Motorists are advised to drive with caution as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.
